unnormalised: **EdTech Buzz: Virtual Classrooms - Here to Stay, Yaar!**
normalised: **EdTech Buzz: Virtual Classrooms - Here to Stay, Friend!**

unnormalised: Hey folks, forget chutti! Virtual classrooms are proving they're more than just a COVID-era fad. Schools across India, from DPS Delhi to local government schools in Kerala, are sticking with them.
normalised: Hey folks, forget holiday! Virtual classrooms are proving they are more than just a covid-era fad. Schools across India, from D P S Delhi to local government schools in Kerala, are sticking with them.

unnormalised: Turns out, things like online resources are a big hit. Imagine, instead of lugging around heavy bags, kids can access everything on their tablets. Talk about a Diwali gift!
normalised: Turns out, things like online resources are a big hit. Imagine, instead of lugging around heavy bags, kids can access everything on their tablets. Talk about a Diwali gift!

unnormalised: Plus, educators are getting creative. Think interactive quizzes, virtual field trips to the Taj Mahal, and even online collaborative projects connecting students from Mumbai to Manipur.
normalised: Plus, educators are getting creative. Think interactive quizzes, virtual field trips to the Taj Mahal, and even online collaborative projects connecting students from Mumbai to Manipur.

unnormalised: Many parents in Chennai feel their kids are getting more personalized attention than in traditional classrooms.
normalised: Many parents in Chennai feel their kids are getting more personalized attention than in traditional classrooms.

unnormalised: Of course, there are challenges – patchy internet in some areas needs fixing ASAP. But the potential is HUGE.
normalised: Of course, there are challenges – patchy internet in some areas needs fixing as soon as possible. But the potential is huge.

unnormalised: And get this: some schools are even incorporating virtual cooking classes – imagine learning to make biryani with a celebrity chef online!
normalised: And get this: some schools are even incorporating virtual cooking classes – imagine learning to make biryani with a celebrity chef online!
